home.whyProvideEmailAddress: By providing an email address, you can get receipts, login alerts and other important information delivered to you to your email.
home.promptForDefaultOutlet: Regularly Used Outlet; Selecting a regularly used outlet lets you quickly jump to POS after login and use lipi during network outage

productBlueprint.searchForProductBlueprintInputError: Error in Search for Product Blueprint
productBlueprint.productCategoryNotFoundDetails: Unable to find product category with that name
productBlueprint.whatIsProductBlueprintMessage: Product Blueprint is the planning of a Product. Product Blueprint needs to be added only once for a Product. Information of Product Blueprint will be reused in all Product related tasks. Instead of reusing or editing existing product blueprint, we encourage you to create a new product blueprint incase of slight differnces.
productBlueprint.productBlueprintEditConfirmMessage: Editing Product Blueprint will update coresponding product throughout the organization. Editing prices will cause calculations to change. Do you want to prceed?
productBlueprint.productCategoryCreationPromptmessage: Product Category helps you search and organise products. Try to make different product categories based on brand, model, feature and type of product.

serviceBlueprint.isCustomerRequired: Is Customer data required? (Longstanding Services require Customer data)
serviceBlueprint.avtivateInAllOutlets: Should this service be made available in all Outlets?
serviceBlueprint.whatIsServiceBlueprintMessage: Service Blueprint is the planning of a Service. Service Blueprint needs to be added only once for a Service. Information of Service Blueprint will be reused in all Service related tasks.
serviceBlueprint.serviceBlueprintEditConfirmMessage: Editing Service Blueprint will update coresponding service throughout the organization and it's memberships. Editing price and duration will cause calculations to change. Do you want to prceed?

inventory.moveSelectedHelp: The above selected products can now be moved to any other Inventory. Select an Inventory from below list and confirm Inventory Transfer;
inventory.noProductsInInventory: No products in this Inventory. Add a new product or you can transfer product from other inventories to this inventory.
inventory.addToInventoryHelp: Products added to Inventory will not increase the count of existing similar products, instead will be a new Batch. Today's date will be used as 'Added-On date' for the new Batch of products.

payment.pleaseCallUsToPurchaseSubscription: Call us at +880 1770 947908 to purchase a subscription.

bulkImportProductBlueprint.downloadSectionTip: Download the template file, we will be creating multiple Product Blueprints at once using this file;
bulkImportProductBlueprint.instructionOne: 1. The downloaded file: 'Lipi Product Blueprint Bulk Upload CSV.csv', is a CSV format file, you can use any Spreadsheet software to view and update this file. It should look like this:
bulkImportProductBlueprint.instructionTwo: 2. Enter a unique product blueprint Name like so;
bulkImportProductBlueprint.instructionThree: 3. Enter a Unit of the product blueprint, example: kg, piece or box;
bulkImportProductBlueprint.instructionFour: 4. Enter Purchase Price, Sale Price and VAT percentage of the product blueprint;
bulkImportProductBlueprint.instructionFive: 5. Under Returnable enter 'yes' if customers can return this product blueprint, 'no' if not;
bulkImportProductBlueprint.instructionSix: 6. Under Barcode enter the product's barcode number (you can leave it empty);
bulkImportProductBlueprint.instructionLast: 7. All the fields must be entered, like below, or else Lipi will not accept this file;
bulkImportProductBlueprint.uploadSectionTip: Upload the CSV file containing Product Blueprint data;
bulkImportProductBlueprint.successfullyImported: Import Successful, total product blueprints created
